column4: Which device do you have? I have karmic on a laptop with a Broadcom 4312. I just put the WiFi firmware files in place and was able to activate the broadcom sta drivers.
ok, same device I have. Have you run the process to extract the WiFi firmware?
I'm looking for the infromation. I found a web site that told me how to do it.
I don't think it was the page I used but this may help --> http://my.opera.com/e-mak/blog/configuring-a-builtin-broadcom-4312-wireless-card-on-hp-pavilion-dv6059ea
